page.title: 08Eating Habits in Stevington
page.content: The media and travel have introduced a foreign flavour to our foods but the main influence is still the family,its age range and occupations.Travel is involved whether to work or school therefore a midday meal at home, certainly on weekdays,is out of the question.This means taking a packed lunch or having a canteen meal and makes the evening meal the most substantial one of the day.Breakfast tends to be quick and easy; cereal, toast,tea or coffee.People at home all day may still follow the traditional cooked breakfast,dinner,tea and supper routine.Commodities used are home produced or purchased.Milk is delivered daily and the village shop provides everyday requirements.Cooking is either traditional using electricity,calor gas,oil or solid fuel or microwave for speed.
